component.name: JDK Mission Control
component.summary: A Profiling and Diagnostics Tool for the Hotspot JVM

description.p: JDK Mission Control is a powerful profiler for HotSpot JVMs and has an advanced set of tools that enables efficient and detailed analysis of the extensive data collected by JDK Flight Recorder. The tool chain enables developers and administrators to collect and analyze data from Java applications running locally or deployed in production environments.
